content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lvl-3 EnchantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Enchant lvl-3 amulet
This article is about the spell. For the magic tablet, see Enchant ruby or topaz.
Lvl-3 Enchant
Released 24 May 2001 (Update)
Members No
Level 49
Spellbook Standard
Type Utility
Experience 59
Runes 5 1
Casting speed 3 ticks (7 on autocast)
Description For use on a ruby and topaz jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Lvl-3 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 49 Magic to cast. The spell enchants ruby and red topaz items, primarily jewellery, granting 59 Magic experience when doing so.

This spell can be transferred to a magic tablet by bringing the required runes and a piece of soft clay to a lectern in the study of a player-owned house, granting the same experience as casting the spell.

List of items[edit | edit source]

Free-to-play players can only use the spell to enchant the ruby amulet.

Unenchanted Enchanted Profit[e 1]
Item GE price Item GE price
Ruby ring 1,009 Ring of forging 1,005 −120
Ruby necklace 1,115 Digsite pendant[e 2] N/A N/A
Ruby bracelet 1,158 Inoculation bracelet 1,259 −15
Ruby amulet 1,135 Amulet of strength 1,244 −7
Ruby sickle (b) N/A Enchanted ruby sickle (b) N/A N/A
Topaz ring 1,781 Efaritay's aid 1,038 −859
Topaz bracelet 2,788 Bracelet of slaughter 3,342 438
Topaz necklace 1,310 Necklace of faith 692 −734
Topaz amulet 2,650 Burning amulet 3,520 754
  1. ^ Includes spell costs; column assumes an appropriate rune-providing item is used.
  2. ^ Requires completion of The Dig Site quest and the finding of a clean necklace at the Varrock Museum.
